mapper.select:
select * from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M a
a.masterguid = #MASTERGUID#
and #RELEASETIME:DATE# >= a.releasetime and (a.obsoletetime is null or #RELEASETIME:DATE# < a.obsoletetime)
and a.hasnextrevision = 'N'
and a.releasetime is not null and a.obsoletetime is null
and a.hasnextrevision = 'N'
order by a.DATASEQ asc, a.colsequence asc
mapper.insert:
into MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M(GUID, MASTERGUID, VARNAME, VARVALUE, CONDITIONJSON1, CONDITIONJSON2, CONDITIONJSON3, CONDITIONJSON4, CONDITIONJSON5, CONDITIONJSON6, CONDITIONJSON7, CONDITIONJSON8, HASNEXTREVISION, COLSEQUENCE, DATASEQ,
CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME) values (#GUID#, #MASTERGUID#, #VARNAME#, #VARVALUE#, #CONDITIONJSON1#, #CONDITIONJSON2#, #CONDITIONJSON3#, #CONDITIONJSON4#, #CONDITIONJSON5#, #CONDITIONJSON6#, #CONDITIONJSON7#, #CONDITIONJSON8#, 'N', #COLSEQUENCE#, #DATASEQ#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update: update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, varname=#VARNAME#, VARVALUE = #VARVALUE#, conditionjson1= #CONDITIONJSON1#, conditionjson2= #CONDITIONJSON2#, conditionjson3= #CONDITIONJSON3#, conditionjson4= #CONDITIONJSON4#, conditionjson5= #CONDITIONJSON5#, conditionjson6= #CONDITIONJSON6#, conditionjson7= #CONDITIONJSON7#, conditionjson8= #CONDITIONJSON8#, colsequence=#COLSEQUENCE#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ# where guid = #GUID#;

update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, hasnextrevision = 'Y' where releasetime is not null and obsoletetime is null and guid = #GUID#;
update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = $CURRENTTIME$, releasetime = $CURRENTTIME$ where releasetime is null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#

update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = $CURRENTTIME$, obsoletetime = $CURRENTTIME$ where obsoletetime is null and hasnextrevision = 'Y' and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#
delete from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M where releasetime is null and guid = #GUID#

update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = $CURRENTTIME$, hasnextrevision = 'N' where hasnextrevision = 'Y' and obsoletetime is null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#;
mapper.delete: delete from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_M where releasetime is null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#;
